title: An Egyptian Story
cast: Nour El-Sherif, Magda El-Khatib, Yousra, Mohsen Mohiedine, Oussama Nadir, Layla Hamadah, Mohamed Mounir, Ragaa Hussein
description: While undergoing heart surgery in London, Yehia reflects on his life as his heart chamber becomes a courtroom where he's tried for his mistakes.

title: Bazaar
cast: Farooq Shaikh, Smita Patil, Naseeruddin Shah, Bharat Kapoor, Supriya Pathak, Rita Rani Kaul, Malika
description: A young man challenges traditional customs by standing up to the father of the woman he loves, who has promised her to a wealthy expatriate.

title: Disco Dancer
cast: Mithun Chakraborty, Kim, Kalpana Iyer, Om Puri, Gita Siddharth, Yusuf Khan, Bob Christo, Om Shivpuri, Karan Razdan
description: A poor boy grows up to be a famous disco dancer, hoping to use his art to exact revenge on the millionaire who once framed him and his mother for theft.

title: Five Elements Ninjas
cast: Tien-chi Cheng, Tien Hsiang Lung, Meng Lo, Michael Chan Wai-Man, Pei Hsi Chen, Li Wang, Ke Chu
description: When five ninjas whose fighting styles are based on natural elements unleash their fury on a rival school, a lone survivor vows deadly revenge.

title: Katha
cast: Farooq Shaikh, Naseeruddin Shah, Deepti Naval, Veeni Paranjape Joglekar, Mallika Sarabhai, Arun Joglekar
description: Secretly in love with his neighbor, a mild-mannered clerk is heartbroken when his much bolder, more charming friend wins her heart instead.

title: Legendary Weapons of China
cast: Gordon Liu, Chia Yung Liu, Hou Hsiao, Chia-Liang Liu, Tiet Wo Chu, Sheng Fu, Kara Hui
listed_in: Action & Adventure, Cult Movies, International Movies
description: Three assassins – magician Lei Ying, hit man Tieh Hon and kung fu master Ti Tan – are sent to Yunnan by their clan leader to bring to justice another clan member who betrayed the tribe.

title: Lock Your Girls In
cast: Fouad El-Mohandes, Sanaa Younes, Sherihan, Ahmed Rateb, Ijlal Zaki, Zakariya Mowafi
description: A widower believes he must marry off his three problematic daughters before he can pursue his real goal of marrying his secret love.

title: Monty Python: Live at The Hollywood Bowl
cast: Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle, Terry Jones, Michael Palin, Neil Innes, Carol Cleveland
description: Film clips and Terry Gilliam animations feature in this live-to-tape performance of greatest hits, including "Travel Agent" and "Solo Wrestling."

title: Namak Halaal
cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Shashi Kapoor, Parveen Babi, Smita Patil, Waheeda Rehman, Om Prakash, Ranjeet, Satyendra Kapoor
description: While loyally defending his boss from mobsters trying to kill him, a naive, hotel bellboy discovers the family he never knew he had.

title: Rocky III
cast: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers, Burgess Meredith, Tony Burton, Mr. T, Hulk Hogan, Ian Fried
description: After taking a pounding from a powerful young fighter, humbled world champ Rocky Balboa turns to ex-rival Apollo Creed for help in regaining his form.

title: Saath Saath
cast: Deepti Naval, Farooq Shaikh, Satish Shah, Iftekhar, A.K. Hangal, Neena Gupta, Avtar Gill, Javed Khan
description: A young woman falls for her classmate’s idealistic, non-materialistic ways, but is troubled upon seeing his principles change after they marry.

title: Satte Pe Satta
cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Hema Malini, Amjad Khan, Sachin, Shakti Kapoor, Ranjeeta Kaur, Paintal, Ranjeet
description: The eldest of seven brothers who run a family farm together marries a pretty nurse, inspiring his country-bumpkin siblings to follow his example.

title: The Dark Crystal
cast: Jim Henson, Kathryn Mullen, Frank Oz, Dave Goelz, Stephen Garlick, Lisa Maxwell, Billie Whitelaw, Percy Edwards, Joseph O'Conor
description: In this mythical tale, Jen, the last of the Gelfling race, is charged with healing the Crystal of Truth after its mutilation sets off an era of terror.

title: The Little Wars
cast: Soraya Khoury, Nabil Ismaïl, Roger Hawa, Reda Khoury, Youcef Hosni, Rifaat Tarabay
description: Beirut resident Soraya is drawn to two men: daredevil photographer Nabil and Talal, who must embrace his feudal heritage when his father is kidnapped.

title: The lynx
cast: Jerzy Radziwiłowicz, Franciszek Pieczka, Piotr Bajor, Ryszarda Hanin, Janusz Paluszkiewicz, Henryk Machalica, Hanna Mikuć, Maria Klejdysz
description: A priest's duties are tested when a young guerrilla asks for absolution while confessing his plans to murder a local man he believes is a traitor.
